articles.description: The trailer of Panchayat 3 was released on 15 May and the show will stream from 28 May on Amazon Prime Video. The show is lead by Jitendra Kumar, Neena Gupta, Rughubir Yadav, Chandan Roy and Faisal Malik.
articles.content:
One of the most-awaited shows of Amazon Prime Video, Panchayat, is back! The trailer for the third season dropped on Wednesday, 15 May.
